nodes.text: Clynese was a writing system used in the Model CEC Class-1 escape pods of the YT-1300 light freighter Millennium Falcon. Inscribed by hand upon one such pod were the words: "PROPERTY OF HAN SOLO PLEASE RETURN."
Clynese was named after the artist who developed it, James Clyne. In The Art of Star Wars: The Last Jedi, Clyne stated that he and Rian Johnson discussed that it might be the Corellian alphabet.
